title: Update: Pregnant woman injured in accidental shooting
content:
OMAHA, Neb. (OPD Press Release) - A man accidentally shot his pregnant girlfriend at an Omaha apartment Sunday night.
Police say 31-year-old Thomas Devore was handling the gun when it fired, wounding 31-year-old Christina Bernal in the leg at the residence near South 75th Street and Mercy Road around 7:15 p.m.
Devore was booked for unlawful use of a firearm.
Man being taken in for questioning after woman confirmed shot near S 75th and Cedar. @WOWT6News pic.twitter.com/12gns1zpVY
— Don Granese (@DonWOWT) November 21, 2016
